question: In a race of 200 m, A can beat B by 31 m and C by 18 m. In a race of 350 m, C will beat B by:
answer_description: A : B = 200 : 169.A : C = 200 : 182.C=CxA=182x200= 182 : 169.BAB200169When C covers 182 m, B covers 169 m.When C covers 350 m, B covers169x 350m= 325 m.182Therefore, C beats B by (350 - 325) m = 25 m.

question: In 100 m race, A covers the distance in 36 seconds and B in 45 seconds. In this race A beats B by:
answer_description: Distance covered by B in 9 sec. =100x 9m= 20 m.45A beats B by 20 metres.

question: In a game of 100 points, A can give B 20 points and C 28 points. Then, B can give C:
In a 200 metres race A beats B by 35 m or 7 seconds. A's time over the course is:
answer_description: B runs 35 m in 7 sec.B covers 200 m in7x 200= 40 sec.35B's time over the course = 40 sec.A's time over the course (40 - 7) sec = 33 sec.

question: A can run 22.5 m while B runs 25 m. In a kilometre race B beats A by:
answer_description: When B runs 25 m, A runs45m.2When B runs 1000 m, A runs45x1x 1000m= 900 m.225B beats A by 100 m.
